# code

**Type Property**

An offer code.

## Declaration

```swift
static let code: Transaction.OfferType
```

## Discussion

You create and define offer codes in App Store Connect. Offer codes are available for any In-App Purchase product type.

For more information about offer codes, see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/manage-subscriptions/set-up-offer-codes].

The raw value of the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/OfferType-swift.struct/code] offer type is `3`.

## Getting offer types

- **introductory**: An introductory offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
- **promotional**: A promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
- **winBack**: A win-back offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
